name: Gaia Man Shaving Kit
description:
Gaia Natural Mens Kit includes: Pre Shave Oil, Shaving Soap, After Shave Splash, After Shave Balm
made with finest organic oils from the Mediterranean enriched butters and scented with pure essential oils of elemis and woody notes.

The Gaia Man Range is unique, natural and has its own distinctive look and feel.  All the labels are printed on re-cycled paper continuing the 'Gaia Natural Products' philosophy of low impact production using only natural ingredients.

name: Eau de Mallorca pillow Spray/Spritzer
description: Our delicious eau de Mallorca  which can be used as an eau de toilette, a spritzer or as a pillow spray was inspired by the scents of Mallorca. Imagine yourself walking in the cooling evening air through a forest to a secluded beach... detect hints of pine, lavende , thyme in warm waves of sensuous scent from the sun warm ground  the metallic scent of the sea represented by pomelo essential oil. 100 ml

name: Perfume Mil Y Un Flor
description: Mil y Un Flor was the first Perfume launched by us in December 2010. It has a delicious fruity top note of Honey, Pear & Pink Grapefruit and at its heart, Rose & Geranium. Finally, at the base Sandalwood and Cedar. The complete the sensuous experience in a hand blown bottle made in Mallorca, laying on a bed of sugar crystallized rose petals which you should let melt onto your tongue when applying the perfume. Each box is hand painted with gold leaf.

name: Body Spa Flor de Sal Soap & Body Polisher
description:
Inspired by Nature’s wisdom we have combined Flor de Sal from the salt flats of Es Trenc with herbs & flowers from the Gaia gardens in the Tramuntana Mountains to create a uniquely natural experience.  The synergy of the healing powers of the sea & the land have been brought together to offer you a new way to care for your body.  Bathe with our pure soap, toning your skin with its high mineral content.  Massage the body polisher across your body, it will gently melt on contact, exfoliating, scenting & profoundly moisturising your skin.  Choose to rinse off, or leave the antioxidant-rich cocoa butter & essential oils to be absorbed.
 
LOVE  The Rose is the international symbol of Love.  It is said that Cleopatra entertained Mark Anthony on a bed of aphrodisiac rose petals.
Rose is the ultimate oil for women, & particularly, brides – balancing emotions, reducing anxiety & inspiring confidence.  It also has supreme skin regeneration properties.
Rose is attuned to the root chakra, & has a rapport with the Water signs:  Cancer, Scorpio & Pisces.
 
“What's in a name?
That which we call a rose 
By any other name would smell as sweet.”
William Shakespeare
1564 – 1616

name: Facial Exfoliation & deep Hydration Kit for the Gaia Goddess
description:
Palmarosa Facial Polisher – Gaia Bathtime’s all-time Bestseller gentle exfoliating polisher. Made with Rose petal powder and finest, gently milled oats, in fact so gentle that you can use it daily.

Gaia Flower Water – Rosewater to refresh and tone your facial skin. Perfect for mature and sensitive skin.  Step 2 to the Gaia Goddess Facial ritual. 100ml

Gaia Goddess Oil - Essential oils blended for the mature and sensitive skin. Five drops are all you need for you face and décolleté.  Rose, Patchouli, and Clary Sage are pure women’s oils and will help nourish and enhance your natural beauty. The final step to the Gaia Goddess Facial ritual and finding the Goddess inside you!
Tip : Before using Palmarosa facial polisher, warm the tablet between the palms of your hands to soften it before gently applying it to your face, using circular movements. This ensures that your skin receives the benefits of the product quickly and effectively. The softened surface of the polisher allows for quick release of the oils onto the skin, and your hands will already have warm oil from the tablet which helps you massage your face after using the tablet.The more you gently massage with your fingers the better the result - cleaner and softened skin.
